archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0146
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer who hasn't verified my identity, I want to be able to be assisted by an agent, so I can get the help I need (e.g. QR code in app scanned in store, NFC, etc)

properties.value: How this should work e2e? The QR code in SC/PIM based on customer id, but how would an agent in a shop be albo to scan/read it? For which situations this applies?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
